org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

Class SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.DataStream<OUT>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    OUT - Output type of the operator.
    O - Type of the operator.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataStreamSink, DataStreamSource, IterativeDataStream

    public class SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O extends SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O>>
extends DataStream<OUT>
    The SingleOutputStreamOperator represents a user defined transformation applied on a DataStream with one predefined output type.

    • Method Detail

      • setParallelism

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> setParallelism(int dop)
        Sets the degree of parallelism for this operator. The degree must be 1 or more.
        Parameters:
        dop - The degree of parallelism for this operator.
        Returns:
        The operator with set degree of parallelism.

      • setMutability

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> setMutability(boolean isMutable)
        Sets the mutability of the operator. If the operator is set to mutable, the tuples received in the user defined functions, will be reused after the function call. Setting an operator to mutable reduces garbage collection overhead and thus increases scalability. Please note that if a DataStream#batchReduce or DataStream#windowReduce is used as mutable, the user can only iterate through the iterator once in every invoke.
        Parameters:
        isMutable - The mutability of the operator.
        Returns:
        The operator with mutability set.

      • setBufferTimeout

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> setBufferTimeout(long timeoutMillis)
        Sets the maximum time frequency (ms) for the flushing of the output buffer. By default the output buffers flush only when they are full.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - The maximum time between two output flushes.
        Returns:
        The operator with buffer timeout set.

      • split

        public SplitDataStream<OUT> split(OutputSelector<OUT> outputSelector)
        Operator used for directing tuples to specific named outputs using an OutputSelector. Calling this method on an operator creates a new SplitDataStream.
        Parameters:
        outputSelector - The user defined OutputSelector for directing the tuples.
        Returns:
        The SplitDataStream

      • forward

        public SingleOutputStreamOperator<OUT,O> forward()
        Description copied from class: DataStream
        Sets the partitioning of the DataStream so that the output tuples are forwarded to the local subtask of the next component. This is the default partitioner setting.
        Overrides:
        forward in class DataStream<OUT>
        Returns:
        The DataStream with shuffle partitioning set.
